title: How to report people on goodreads - Quora

response.answer_text: Criticism should be tolerated, lies and personal attacks should not.   Due to the "free speech" of  Goodreads I could not find a way to report someone other than marking them as spam. You can block the user to keep the offense from happening. I also believe that GR has a policy on offensive content about the author. I don't know if that would qualify in this scenario but it is worth looking into.  Badly Behaving Goodreaders <- here's how to block an offensive user

Before you report someone, you should first determine what he's violating. Is he disagreeing with claims made in the Book of Mormon? That's his right. Is he making claims you can prove are false? Show that his claims are false. How is he bullying Mormons? Is he threatening them with physical violence? Is he calling them names?  Why don't you tell us what he's saying (without using his name) and let us discuss the topic?
